title: Please help identify this font! I am obsessed.
content:
I saw this font on a webpage and am in love.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-04-12 at 10.15.27 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018012159/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-04-12%20at%2010.15.27%20AM.png) | 9.72 KB |
author: katiepoo

comments.content: The font is called [Rotis, or Rotis Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018012159/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/rotis-sans-serif/).
